Room.Name: Islandia Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking peacefully along Islandia Road, south of the Cathedral.
Room.LongDescription: The Cathedral of Worldly Bliss is one of the largest facilities of its kind in Oceancrest, and perhaps much of the world. Only the most powerful and most worthy clerics are allowed inside, and very few are ever seen wondering around in the first place. Occasionally, the Cathedral will hold festivities and other events for the public's benefit, but this is usually just a front to collect more money from the poor.
